title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: During text change with word wrap, StyledText is experiencing inefficient redraws. There are multiple redraws occurring instead of just one per visible line.
EB: This issue should be resolved so that there is a maximum of one redraw for each visible line during text change with word wrap.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Add the following line to the 'performPaint' method of StyledText:
   System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
2. Run the test case.
